extendedInfo.description: For all you Bronies and lovers of MLP:FiM alike, I present to you the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic soundboard, complete with over 550 sound clips from 43 different characters. You can now brag to your friends that you have the best and most complete MLP soundboard available on Google Play!Version 1.8 is here - A character update version!----------------------------------------------------------------------This update is dedicated to those who have left comments telling me what ponies, and clips to add. Don't see your favorite clip or character yet - don't worry! I plan to add more characters and lines and release updates incrementally, so eventually you will probably see your clip or character added to the soundboard.My goal for the future of this app is to let the community decide who/what lines and features get added to the soundboard. So, if you have an idea, a pony or line you want added, or something just plain ain't working right, don't hesitate to post a comment or email me!Features include:-------------------------- Over 550 high quality sound clips from 43 different characters- Ability to set sound clips as alarm, notification, ringtone or all 3- Ability to save your favorite clips to the favorites section- Random clip button- Acts as ringtone selector for certain devices- Ability to set set your favorite quotes as widgetsCurrent characters include:---------------------------------------Apple Bloom, Applejack, Babs Seed, Big Mac, Carrot Top, Cheerilee, Derpy, Diamond Tiara, Discord, Dr. Whooves, Fancepants, Flim Flam Brothers, Flutterguy, Fluttershy, Gilda, Granny Smith, Gustave Le Grand, Iron Will, King Sombra, Lyra Heartstrings, Nightmare Moon, Photo Finish, Pinkie Pie, Princess Cadance, Princess Celestia, Princess Luna, Queen Chrysalis, Rainbow Dash, Rarity, Sapphire Shores, Scootaloo, Shining Armor, Silver Spoon, Soarin, Spike, Spitfire, Steven Magnet, Sweetie Belle, Sweetie Drops (Bon-Bon), Trixie, Twilight Sparkle, Twist and ZecoraAll sound clips and images contained in this app are the property of Hasbro.All sound clips are from kyrospawn's zip file of sound clips located here: http://kyrospawn.deviantart.com/art/MLP-FIM-Soundboard-V8-4-244757196All the new clips, starting from version 1.8, I have extracted myself from the episodes.

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: The reason i gave it 4 stars is because it\'s missing Flutterguy singing Pinkie Pie\'s song about Zecora. If u add that then I\'ll give it 5 stars

reviews.title: I love it! (*-*)
reviews.comment: Could you at the equestria girls soundtrack too please? I especially watch sunset shimmer on there

reviews.title: SWEET
reviews.comment: Ive been looking for this forever, thanks so much man! :D

reviews.title: Awesome but,
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me update... and it\'s not my phone, my friend updated it just fine and she\'s got millions of other games on her phone. :0/
reviews.author: Naomi Sawkins

reviews.title: Very nice!
reviews.comment: Great soundboard with some great quotes. However, I\'d like to see it updated with some more of the S3 quotes from Discord/Fluttershy/etc at some point. Still a very fun app though.
reviews.author: Tom Rinaldo

reviews.comment: AWESOME!!!!! Please add more sounds and characters (MLP:FIM and Equestria Girls). Also, please add songs.\t-Add Songs -Add More Characters -Add More Sounds -Add Characters from Equestria Girls -Also Add more \"Squee-ing\" and other tiny sounds
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Add Minuette please, its my daughters name and she loves MLP
reviews.author: Mike Biggs

reviews.title: Fantastic (and FREE) My Little Pony Soundboard
reviews.comment: This great Android app does exactly what you would expect it to do and more! Many MLP fans would have been satisfied just with having the ability to play voice clips from their favourite characters. However, that wasn\'t enough for developer Eric. A recent update added widget capability to the app so now you can play voice clips of your favourite ponies (and non-ponies) right from your home screen by tapping on the characters\' faces! Eric is also to be commended for his prompt responses to any issues and bugs that are brought to his attention. I hereby give this app 5 out of 5 stars!
reviews.author: Paul Yew

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: Has all my favorite pony\'s!!  :)
reviews.author: mike carder

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: I love this app. I use it for my ringtones and I annoy my family by responding to them using it! For the geniuses requesting music...stop. It\'s not a music app, it\'s for quotes. Download the music separately through Music Mania or something. Thank you for adding Flutterguy!! Loved that sode.

reviews.title: I love it!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been wanting a mlp soundboard for the longest time and now I got it and it updates pretty constant. Again I love it!

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: 5 stars!

reviews.title: Fluttershy
reviews.comment: Fluttershy is being neglected and definitely needs some love. Other than that, the app is solid. You will not find another app as complete as this one, although it is the only other soundboard on the store.

reviews.comment: it won\'t let me move it to sd card.i only have a 100 mb internal storage.... Please fix that?

reviews.title: No brony should be without
reviews.comment: This is, single handedly, the best android Mlp-fim app of all. Variety? Check. Constant updates? Check. Easy transfer to ringtones and alarms? Check. Good quality? OH SWEET CELESTIA CHECK! As I said, no brony should be without.
reviews.author: A Google User
